#header::before {

    transform: translatex(-50%);

}

#header::after {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    background: white;
    opacity: 0.01;
    height: 25.5%;
    width: 0.5rem;
    bottom: 53%;
    left: calc(50% - 0.25rem);
    transform-origin: bottom center;
    transform: rotate(calc(360deg - 30deg * var(--minutes-to-midnight)/60));
}

#extra-div-3 {

    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;

    background-position: center;
    background-repeat: repeat-x;

}
